title: Never a Bride
description: Meet Kat McKinney: Marital AidKat doesn’t envy her married and to-be-married friends. Really. Well, maybe she envies them the party. And their ability to be sure of someone. Maybe that.But if some of those married and to-be-married friends want to include her as a third from time to time…Well, who is she to disappoint them?Insightful, funny, sometimes sad, but always sexy, Never a Bride is the third story in the Kat McKinney, Wedding Slut series:1 Wedded Bliss2 Plus One3 Never a Bride4 Formal WearAvailable now in the collection The Bridesmaid Always Comes Twice: The Adventures of Kat McKinney(F/F/M ménage à trois romance. Adult readers only.)
author: Mary Cyn
